item.title: Poet Draws Retail Buzz After Nvidia Mentions Optics Tech In New AI Data Center Platform
item.description: Poet, which designs and manufactures high-speed optical engines and related photonic components, is still in an early commercial phase.

item.title: Why Is Alibaba Stock Falling In Premarket Today?

item.title: Bitcoin’s Path To $2.9 Million Hinges On Global Trade, Central Bank Adoption: VanEck
item.description: Under the bull case scenario, VanEck said “hyper-bitcoinization” could take Bitcoin’s price as high as $53.4 million.
